overview: Wai is the leader of a gang of rascals who rape Mo Yi Hing. The police arrive moments before Chiang, Wai’s head gunman, was to shoot Yi Hing dead. Yi Hing is no angel and goes to prison, but she keeps trying to escape, to take revenge on Wai. Wai is a pretty tough guy, but he fears for his life, and tries to have Yi Hing killed.
title: Crocodile Hero
